content.p: The way we see the world and ourselves informs our identity and the way we communicate. Our identity is formed of a central idea – a world beyond ordinary – our strengths and our values. Read more about our brand proposition and university values We subscribe to a set of principles, to help us collaborate on content efficiently, effectively and happily. They highlight what's important to us when creating, managing and maintaining our content – whatever form it takes. Put them into practice to create Nottingham content in the Nottingham way. Find out how to put our content principles into practice
